sentences.en: "Let's invite her to dinner." — "Over my dead body!"
sentences.cn: “我们请她来吃晚饭吧。”——“除非我死了！”

sentences.en: "That is correct, Meg," he answered in his cold, dead voice.
sentences.cn: “没错，梅格。”他用冰冷、阴沉的声音答道。

sentences.en: A national poll shows the presidential race in a dead heat.
sentences.cn: 一项全国民意调查显示总统竞选相持不下。

sentences.en: a pile of dead leaves
sentences.cn: 一堆枯叶

sentences.en: A policeman has been shot dead in an ambush.
sentences.cn: 一名警察在一次伏击中中弹身亡。

sentences.en: But that doesn't mean this brand of politics is dead or dying.
sentences.cn: 但那并不意味着这种政治主张已经或正在消亡。

sentences.en: Christ rose from the dead.
sentences.cn: 耶稣死而复生。

sentences.en: Christ rose from the dead.
sentences.cn: 耶稣死而复生。

sentences.en: Christ rose from the dead.
sentences.cn: 耶稣死而复生。

sentences.en: He suddenly had a heart attack and dropped dead .
sentences.cn: 他突发心脏病猝死。

sentences.en: He was obviously dead drunk .
sentences.cn: 他显然醉得不行了。

sentences.en: her judgement was dead on.
sentences.cn: 她的判断完全正确。

sentences.en: Her mother had been dead for ten years.
sentences.cn: 她母亲去世十年了。

sentences.en: Her parents were long dead .
sentences.cn: 她父母早就去世了。

sentences.en: His fellow climbers had left him for dead on the mountain.
sentences.cn: 他的登山伙伴以为他已死，便把他留在山上走了。

sentences.en: I wouldn't be seen dead in a navy suit.
sentences.cn: 我死都不会穿海军服的。

sentences.en: if anyone finds out, you're dead meat.
sentences.cn: 要是有人发现，你就死定了。

sentences.en: Magnus was found dead in his car.
sentences.cn: 马格纳斯被人发现死在他自己的车里。

sentences.en: One man is still missing, presumed dead .
sentences.cn: 仍有一人失踪，被推定已经死亡。

sentences.en: Police are trying to contact the family of the dead man.
sentences.cn: 警方在设法与死者的家属联系。

sentences.en: She was pronounced dead on arrival at the hospital.
sentences.cn: 到达医院时她被宣告已经死亡。

sentences.en: The blood drained from his face, leaving the skin dead white.
sentences.cn: 他的脸失去了血色，变得一片死灰。

sentences.en: the dead body of a young soldier
sentences.cn: 一名年轻士兵的尸体

sentences.en: The dead included six people attending a religious ceremony.
sentences.cn: 死者包括6位参加宗教仪式的人。

sentences.en: The deal with Chelsea may not, however, be dead.
sentences.cn: 不过，与切尔西的交易或许还有戏。

sentences.en: The effect is soft and pretty rather than drop-dead sexy.
sentences.cn: 给人的印象是柔和俏丽而不是吸人眼球的性感。

sentences.en: The riot left four people dead and several dozen injured.
sentences.cn: 暴乱中四人丧生，数十人受伤。

sentences.en: The thought almost stopped me dead in my tracks.
sentences.cn: 这个想法几乎让我一下子停步。

sentences.en: The village is haunted by the ghosts of the dead children.
sentences.cn: 死去的孩子们的幽灵常在该村出没。

sentences.en: They were told to carry their wounded and leave their dead.
sentences.cn: 他们被命令抬走伤员，丢下死者。

sentences.en: Two alleged collaborators were shot dead by masked activists.
sentences.cn: 两名涉嫌通敌者被蒙面的激进分子击毙。

sentences.en: Two men were shot dead by terrorists.
sentences.cn: 两名男子遭恐怖分子枪杀。

sentences.en: We buried it in the garden at dead of night.
sentences.cn: 我们在夜深人静的时候把它埋到了花园里。

sentences.en: We didn’t know if she was dead or alive.
sentences.cn: 我们不知道她是死是活。

sentences.en: When he saw her, he stopped dead in his tracks (= suddenly stopped moving completely ) .
sentences.cn: 他一看见她就呆若木鸡了。

sentences.en: When they found him he was more dead than alive .
sentences.cn: 他们发现他的时候，他已奄奄一息。

words.tran_cn: 致命的；非常的；死一般的
致命；深仇大恨；不共戴天
死；死一样的状态；无精打采
死，死亡；枯萎；失去活力（die的ing形式）
变得如死一般；失去活力

phrases.tran_cn: n. 没用的人，废物；无用的东西
预付的工资；旧债；无益的事
[解]死腔；[解]无效区；[电子]无信号区
死区（电波不能到达的地区）；盲区；静区
[美国俚语]当真，一点不假；老实说

phrases.phrase: wouldn't be seen (或 caught) dead in (或 with, at 等)
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)［用于表示对某事物的强烈厌恶］死也不要

trans.tran_cn: 死的，死气沉沉的，用尽的，没电的，完全的，已停滞的
trans.tran_en: a dead  planet  has no life on it
